main.name: Kaustubh Deshpande
main.description: Freelance Software Developer | Experience building apps in Python, React, Typescript | Full Stack Engineer | Machine Learning Enthusiast
main.bio: Hi, I'm Kaustubh. I'm a FullStack developer / Freelancer. Currently I'm in my final year engineering, and I'm open to work opportunities. Feel free to contact me for a freelance project or a full time offer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

 MISC : Git , MJML, Falcon, Raspberry Pi, Arduino, NodeMCU, AWS, Firebase

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
